channel.name: Retry periodic failure
channel.description:
This retry example channel has a random ADT generator attached to a translator which has an example of calling the retry module.
This can be used to recover from periodic errors.
http://help.interfaceware.com/v6/retry-example

to_mapper.commit_comment: Import Translators: Import all tool channels.

from_mapper.commit_comment: Import Translators: Import all tool channels.
